title: Honoring Detective Robert Mooney upon the occasion of his retirement from the New York City Police Department
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring Detective Robert Mooney upon the occa-
sion of his retirement from the New York City Police Department

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize and honor
those distinguished officers  and  citizens  who  devote  themselves  to
public  service,  demonstrating great courage and diligence in providing
for the care and welfare of the citizens of their communities  and  this
great Empire State; and
  WHEREAS,  Within  every  community  of the State of New York there are
certain individuals who, by virtue of their commitment  and  dedication,
command  the  respect  and admiration of their community for their exem-
plary contributions and service on behalf of others; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is  justly  proud  to  honor  Detective
Robert Mooney upon the occasion of his retirement from the New York City
Police Department, to be celebrated on Wednesday, February 23, 2011; and
  WHEREAS,  Moving  up  in  the ranks, Robert Mooney currently serves as
Deputy Chief of  the  Investigation  Bureau  for  the  New  York  County
District  Attorney's  office; his wealth of experience and knowledge has
earned the respect of the local community; and
  WHEREAS, An accomplished investigator with 27 years of  experience  in
the  New York City Police Department, Robert Mooney was the senior rank-
ing detective in the prestigious Manhattan North Homicide  Squad;  since
1993,  he  had  cleared the vast majority of the homicide squad's major,
high-profile crimes; and
  WHEREAS, Earning his Bachelor of Arts degree in Police  Administration
from  Eastern  Kentucky  University,  Robert Mooney's areas of expertise
include interviewing victims  and  witnesses  to  develop  complete  and
coherent  accounts  of  their  observations;  interrogating suspects and
eliciting confessions that conform to legal  and  constitutional  stand-
ards;  crime  scene  application  of  a wide array of forensic sciences,
including nuclear and mitochondrial DNA; and hostage negotiation; and
  WHEREAS, Robert Mooney has served in several other  capacities  within
his  career,  including  Security  Consultant, Police Officer, Detective
Third Grade, Detective  Second  Grade,  New  York  City  Police  Academy
Instructor, and Detective First Grade; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that those dedicated
public  servants  who unselfishly devote their lives to the preservation
of order and the protection of others are worthy and due full praise for
their commitment and noble endeavors; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Detective  Robert Mooney upon the occasion of his retirement from
the New York City Police Department; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Robert Mooney, Deputy Chief of the Investigation  Bureau  for
the New York County District Attorney's Office.
